title: Directs the control or uses heavy vehicles
description: Selecting this would qualify you as an OPERATOR who is a recognized participant in the chain of responsibility and come under NHVR Compliance.

title: Employes Heavy Vehicle Driver(s)
description: Selecting this would qualify you as an EMPLOYER who is a recognized participant in the chain of responsibility and come under NHVR Compliance.

title: Contracts Transport Activities to external / other parties
description: Selecting this would qualify you as an PRIME CONTRACTOR who is a recognized participant in the chain of responsibility and come under NHVR Compliance.

title: Schedules transport of goods in Heavy Vehicles and / or Scehdules Heavy Vehicles Driver's work
description: Selecting this would qualify you as an SCHEDULER who is a recognized participant in the chain of responsibility and come under NHVR Compliance.
